name: R O C C
description:
WORLD 1 and 3 LEVELS OF WORLD 2 RELEASED, MORE COMING SOON!

HOW TO PLAY: Move your rock to the green portals at the end of each level using the controls! The farter you get, the more mechanics are introduced. Have Fun!

--- CONTROLS ---

WASD / Arrow Keys: Heart Movement

Left Click / Space: Pull

LShift / Right Click: Ability

R / Backspace: Restart Section

Thats all! Have Fun! More updates coming soon!
